First aid information?: If you suspect a reaction to this product, discontinue use, wash treated skin, and call your local poison control center. If you go to a doctor take this repellent with you.
What special restrictions are placed on: Do not contaminate water, food, or feed by storage and disposal. Never place unused product down any indoor or outdoor drain.
How, where, and on what crop should I us: Apply over all exposed skin to repel biting insects. Use just enough repellent to cover exposed skin, Do not use under clothing. If used on face, spread on hands first then apply sparingly to face and ears. Do not apply near eyes and mouth. Avoid over-application. When using on children, apply to your own hands and then put it on the child. Do not apply to children's hands.
How does the product have to be stored o: Store this product in a cool, dry place that is inaccessible to children. If empty: Nonrefillable container. Do not reuse or refill this container. Offer for recycling, if available. If partly filled: Call your local solid waste agency for disposal instructions.
